channel.title: Wands, Steve on Chege's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Wands, Steve on Chege's Blog

item.title: Lucifer (2018-2020)
item.description: Lucifer (2018 - present) by Dan Watters. Image from dc.com Memorable Plot Points [John Decker] All I’m trying to say is… who cares if you had some connection to this place? Who cares if you and your cousins hung out with the creepiest people alive? I had the you that I had, and I loved you. You can keep your secrets. [Lucifer] You blame me for your sins and tragedies?
